name: Interactive Multi-Game Demo Disc Version 22
overview: Interactive Multi Game Demo Disc v22 is a demo and video sampler disc (one of a number of versions available during the 2004 holiday season), designed for retail store displays of the Nintendo GameCube. The sampler includes a simple menu and playable demos of Mario Power Tennis, Metroid Prime 2: Echoes, Donkey Konga, Resident Evil 4, Viewtiful Joe 2, Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean, and Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door. The disc also features pre-release movie trailers of the following: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes, Resident Evil 4, Geist, Tony Hawk's Underground 2, GoldenEye: Rogue Agent, X-Men Legends, Need for Speed: Underground 2, Mario Power Tennis, Mario Party 6, The Urbz: Sims in the City, NBA Live 2005, and the Nintendo DS.
